snippet: Attorney General Kamala Harris joined others suing a utility company over a natural gas leak that has driven thousands of Los Angeles residents from their homes.
lead_paragraph: Attorney General Kamala Harris joined others suing a utility company over a natural gas leak that has driven thousands of Los Angeles residents from their homes.

headline.main: California: State Enters Suit Over Long-Running Gas Leak
headline.print_headline: California: State Enters Suit Over Long-Running Gas Leak
